items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: Beru is a lightweight, type-safe state management library for React and React Native, offering seamless persistence and easy integration with various storage solutions.
items.title: alok-shete/beru: Beru is a lightweight, type-safe state management library for React and React Native, offering seamless persistence and easy integration with various storage solutions.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript package for binary search on a sorted array with automatic sorting support.
items.title: Naveen-KumarJ/binary-search-npm: A lightweight JavaScript package for binary search on a sorted array with automatic sorting support.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript address selector for the Philippines, designed to streamline the process of selecting regions, provinces, cities, and barangays in web applications.
items.title: its-ryyt/Philippines---Javascript-Address-Selector: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript address selector for the Philippines, designed to streamline the process of selecting regions, provinces, cities, and barangays in web applications.

items.content_html: EntityORM is a lightweight TypeScript ORM inspired by Entity Framework, enabling expressive, array-like database queries with real JavaScript syntax — powered by Acorn and PostgreSQL.
items.title: irvanherz/entityorm: EntityORM is a lightweight TypeScript ORM inspired by Entity Framework, enabling expressive, array-like database queries with real JavaScript syntax — powered by Acorn and PostgreSQL.

items.content_html: A lightweight, interactive canvas-based vector visualizer for math, linear algebra, and ML education. Built with React + TypeScript.
items.title: megafarad/canvas-math-kit: A lightweight, interactive canvas-based vector visualizer for math, linear algebra, and ML education. Built with React + TypeScript.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: `eslint-plugin-import-x` is a fork of `eslint-plugin-import` that aims to provide a more performant and more lightweight version of the original plugin.
items.title: un-ts/eslint-plugin-import-x: `eslint-plugin-import-x` is a fork of `eslint-plugin-import` that aims to provide a more performant and more lightweight version of the original plugin.

items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.
items.title: simstudioai/sim: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

items.content_html: A lightweight collaborative drawing platform built with Excalidraw, Next.js, YJS and Socket.IO, enabling real-time whiteboard collaboration with persistent storage capabilities.
items.title: mizuka-wu/excalidraw-yjs-starter: A lightweight collaborative drawing platform built with Excalidraw, Next.js, YJS and Socket.IO, enabling real-time whiteboard collaboration with persistent storage capabilities.

items.content_html: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟
items.title: AmaanMultani/lite-debounce-js: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟

items.content_html: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙
items.title: luanreis28aa/hycom-api: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨
items.title: thegamer49520/timeout-typescript: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨

items.content_html: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀
items.title: ratul3429/bun-microservice-gateways: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀
